name: The Plan - Shaun of the Dead
description: Shaun explains his zombie survival plan with Edgar Wright's signature match-cut montage

visual_style.color_grade: desaturated, teal shadows, warm highlights, slight green push
visual_style.lighting_style: practical sources, overcast daylight exteriors, warm tungsten interiors
visual_style.style_suffix: 2.35:1 anamorphic, film grain, desaturated color grade, Edgar Wright style

shaun.name: Shaun
shaun.costume: White dress shirt, red tie, dark grey-blue jacket, blood scratch on cheek
shaun.generate_prompt: Professional character reference sheet, front and 3/4 profile. British man early 30s, short receding blonde hair, stubble, blood scratch marks on right cheek. Wearing white dress shirt with blood stains, red tie, dark grey-blue harrington jacket. Clean white background, studio lighting, 4K photorealistic

ed.name: Ed
ed.costume: Beige 'I GOT WOOD' t-shirt with blood stains
ed.generate_prompt: Professional character reference sheet, front and 3/4 profile. British man late 20s, dark brown messy hair, round face, stubble, slightly overweight. Wearing dirty beige t-shirt with 'I GOT WOOD' orange text, blood stains. Clean white background, studio lighting, 4K photorealistic

barbara.name: Barbara (Mum)
barbara.generate_prompt: Professional character reference sheet. British woman early 60s, short grey-brown bob haircut, kind maternal face. Wearing purple top with grey cardigan. Clean white background, studio lighting, 4K photorealistic

liz.name: Liz
liz.generate_prompt: Professional character reference sheet. British woman late 20s, blonde hair. Wearing light blue track jacket. Clean white background, studio lighting, 4K photorealistic

philip.name: Philip (Stepfather/Zombie)
philip.generate_prompt: Professional character reference sheet. British man late 50s, grey-brown disheveled hair, gaunt angular face, zombie makeup with pale grey complexion and dark sunken eyes. Wearing teal blue polo shirt. Clean white background, studio lighting, 4K photorealistic

edgar_wright_techniques: Whip pan transitions between scenes (8 instances)
Rapid match cuts on action words
ECU insert shots of mundane objects (doorbell, mug, foot on pedal, car door)
Camera push-in with character turn combo
